commands.title: Help

longDescription:
Meet MyHub for AOS-UG, a convenient one-stop-shop for managing existing Microsoft 365 workspaces and creating new ones—all from Microsoft Teams!  
 MyHub for AOS-UG makes it easy to organize, understand, and access all your Microsoft workspaces by helping you:
 * Create workspace hubs based on different criteria, such as purpose or topic
 * Classify Teams, Groups, SharePoint sites, and Yammer communities with customized tags
 * Manage membership of Teams and Groups
 * Easily access content, tasks, and more associated with each workspace
 * Receive notifications from the bot after creating new workspaces
 Customers of AvePoint’s Confidence Platform can also perform provisioning, recertification, and lifecycle tasks right from MyHub for AOS-UG in Teams.  
 New to MyHub for AOS-UG? [Sign up for free](https://myhub.avepointonlinegcc.online15.net)  
 Additional Resources  
 [Product user guide](https://avepointcdn.azureedge.net/assets/webhelp/myhub-administrator-guide/index.htm#!Documents/aboutmyhub.htm)  
 Reach out to [AvePoint Support](https://www.avepoint.com/products/support) for additional help  
 MyHub for AOS-UG has been created specifically for use by customers of AvePoint’s FedRAMP (Moderate) Authorized cloud (AOS-UG). If you are leveraging AvePoint's Commercial cloud (AOS), please use the MyHub application. If you are leveraging AvePoint’s US sovereign cloud (AOS-US), please use the MyHub for AOS-US application for full compatibility.
shortDescription: Easily manage and organize Microsoft Teams, Groups, SharePoint, and Yammer

localizedDefinitions.name: MyHub for AOS-UG

localizedDefinitions.longDescription:
Lernen Sie MyHub for AOS-UG kennen, Ihren bequemen One-Stop-Shop für die Verwaltung bestehender und die Erstellung neuer Microsoft 365-Arbeitsbereiche - alles von Microsoft Teams aus!  
 MyHub for AOS-UG macht es Ihnen leicht, all Ihre Microsoft-Arbeitsbereiche zu organisieren, zu verstehen und darauf zuzugreifen.
 * Erstellen Sie Arbeitsbereich-Hubs auf der Grundlage verschiedener Kriterien, wie Zweck oder Thema
 * Kassifizieren Sie Teams, Gruppen, SharePoint-Sites und Yammer-Communities mit benutzerdefinierten Tags
 * Verwalten Sie Mitgliedschaften in Teams und Gruppen
 * Greifen Sie auf Inhalte, Aufgaben und mehr, die mit jedem Arbeitsbereich verbunden sind, zu
 * Erhalten Sie Benachrichtigungen vom Bot nach der Erstellung neuer Arbeitsbereiche  
 Kunden, die bereits die Confidence-Plattform von AvePoint nutzen, können auch Provisionierungs-, Rezertifizierungs- und Lebenszyklus-Aufgaben direkt von MyHub for AOS-UG in Teams durchführen.  
 Sind Sie neu bei MyHub for AOS-UG? [Kostenlos anmelden](https://myhub.avepointonlinegcc.online15.net)  
 Zusätzliche Ressourcen  
 [Nutzerhandbuch des Produkts](https://avepointcdn.azureedge.net/assets/webhelp/myhub-administrator-guide/index.htm#!Documents/aboutmyhub.htm)  
 Wenden Sie sich an [AvePoint-Support](https://www.avepoint.com/products/support) für zusätzliche Hilfe.
localizedDefinitions.shortDescription: Einfache Verwaltung und Organisation von Teams, Gruppen, SharePoint und Yammer

localizedDefinitions.name: MyHub for AOS-UG

localizedDefinitions.longDescription:
Conozca MyHub for AOS-UG, un sitio único y conveniente para administrar espacios de trabajo existentes de Microsoft 365 y crear nuevos; todo desde de Microsoft Teams.  
 MyHub for AOS-UG facilita la organización, la comprensión y el acceso a todos sus espacios de trabajo de Microsoft al ayudarle a:
 * Crear centros de espacio de trabajo basados en diferentes criterios, como por propósito o tema.
 * Clasificar Microsoft Teams, Grupos, sitios de SharePoint y comunidades Yammer con etiquetas personalizadas.
 * Administrar membresías de Teams y Grupos.
 * Acceder fácilmente al contenido, las tareas y otros servicios asociados con cada espacio de trabajo. 
 * Recibir notificaciones del bot luego de crear nuevos espacios de trabajo.  
 Los clientes de la Plataforma de Confianza de AvePoint también realizan tareas de aprovisionamiento, recertificación y ciclo de vida directamente desde MyHub for AOS-UG en Teams.  
 ¿Nuevo en MyHub for AOS-UG? [Regístrate gratis](https://myhub.avepointonlinegcc.online15.net)  
 Recursos adicionales  
 [Product user guide](https://avepointcdn.azureedge.net/assets/webhelp/myhub-administrator-guide/index.htm#!Documents/aboutmyhub.htm)  
 Comunícate con [Soporte de AvePoint](https://www.avepoint.com/products/support) para obtener ayuda adicional.
localizedDefinitions.shortDescription: Administre y organice fácilmente Microsoft Teams, Grupos, SharePoint y Yammer

localizedDefinitions.name: MyHub for AOS-UG

localizedDefinitions.longDescription:
Voici MyHub for AOS-UG, un guichet unique pratique pour gérer les espaces de travail Microsoft 365 existants et en créer de nouveaux - le tout dans Microsoft Teams !  
 MyHub for AOS-UG facilite l'organisation, la compréhension et l'accès à tous vos espaces de travail Microsoft en vous aidant à :
 * Créer des hubs d'espace de travail en fonction de différents critères, tels que l'objectif ou le sujet
 * Classer les équipes, les groupes, les sites SharePoint et les communautés Yammer à l'aide d'étiquettes personnalisées
 * Gérer l'appartenance des équipes et des groupes
 * Accéder facilement au contenu, aux tâches et plus encore associés à chaque espace de travail
 * Recevoir des notifications du bot après la création de nouveaux espaces de travail  
 Les clients de la plateforme Confidence d'AvePoint peuvent également effectuer des tâches de mise en service, de recertification et de cycle de vie directement à partir de MyHub for AOS-UG dans Teams.  
 Nouveau sur MyHub for AOS-UG ? [Inscrivez-vous gratuitement](https://myhub.avepointonlinegcc.online15.net)  
 Ressources supplémentaires  
 [Guide utilisateur du produit](https://avepointcdn.azureedge.net/assets/webhelp/myhub-administrator-guide/index.htm#!Documents/aboutmyhub.htm)  
 Contactez le [Support AvePoint](https://www.avepoint.com/products/support) pour obtenir de l'aide supplémentaire.
localizedDefinitions.shortDescription: Gérez et organisez facilement Microsoft Teams, les groupes, SharePoint et Yammer

localizedDefinitions.name: MyHub for AOS-UG

localizedDefinitions.longDescription:
Scopri MyHub for AOS-UG, un pratico punto vendita unico dove gestire le aree di lavoro di Microsoft 365 esistenti e crearne di nuove, tutto da Microsoft Teams!  
 MyHub for AOS-UG semplifica l'organizzazione, la comprensione e l'accesso a tutte le aree di lavoro Microsoft consentendo di:
 * Creare hub aree di lavoro in base a criteri diversi, ad esempio lo scopo o l'argomento
 * Classificare Team, Gruppi, siti di SharePoint e community di Yammer con tag personalizzati
 * Gestire l'appartenenza a team e gruppi
 * Accedere facilmente a contenuti, task e altri elementi associati a ciascuna area di lavoro
 * Ricevere notifiche dal bot dopo aver creato nuove aree di lavoro  
 I clienti di AvePoint Confidence Platform possono anche eseguire il provisioning, la ricertificazione e i task del ciclo di vita da MyHub for AOS-UG in Teams.    
 Non conosci MyHub for AOS-UG? [Registrati gratuitamente](https://myhub.avepointonlinegcc.online15.net)  
 Risorse aggiuntive  
 [Guida per l'utente del prodotto](https://avepointcdn.azureedge.net/assets/webhelp/myhub-administrator-guide/index.htm#!Documents/aboutmyhub.htm)  
 Contatta il [Supporto AvePoint](https://www.avepoint.com/products/support) per ulteriore assistenza.
localizedDefinitions.shortDescription: Gestisci e organizza facilmente Microsoft Teams, gruppi, SharePoint e Yammer

commands.title: ヘルプ

localizedDefinitions.longDescription:
MyHub for AOS-UG は、新しい Microsoft 365 ワークスペースの作成および既存のワークスペースの管理をすべて Microsoft Teams インターフェイスから実行することを可能にする便利なツールです。  
 MyHub for AOS-UG で以下のことを実行できるため、すべての Microsoft 365 ワークスペースへのアクセス・ワークスペースの整理および把握が簡単になります。
 * 目的やトピックなど、さまざまな条件に基づいてワークスペース ハブを作成する
 * チーム、グループ、SharePoint サイト、Yammer コミュニティをカスタム タグで分類する
 * チームとグループのメンバーシップを管理する
 * 各ワークスペースに関連付けられたコンテンツ、タスクなどに簡単にアクセスできる
 * 新しいワークスペースの作成後にボットから通知を受信する  
 AvePoint Confidence Platform のお客様は Teams で MyHub for AOS-UG を使用して、プロビジョニング・洗い替え・ライフサイクル タスクを直接実行することもできます。  
 MyHub for AOS-UG を初めて利用する場合: [無料でサインアップ](https://myhub.avepointonlinegcc.online15.net)  
 追加リソース  
 [製品ユーザー ガイド](https://avepointcdn.azureedge.net/assets/webhelp/myhub-administrator-guide/index.htm#!Documents/aboutmyhub.htm)  
 ヘルプが必要な場合、[AvePoint サポート](https://www.avepoint.com/products/support) までお問い合わせください。
localizedDefinitions.shortDescription: Microsoft Teams、Groups、SharePoint、Yammer を簡単に管理および整理します

localizedDefinitions.name: MyHub for AOS-UG

localizedDefinitions.longDescription:
Conheça o MyHub for AOS-UG, uma prática loja de conveniência para gerenciar seus espaços de trabalho do Microsoft 365 existentes e criar novos – tudo a partir do Microsoft Teams.  
 O MyHub for AOS-UG facilita a organização, a compreensão e o acesso a todos os seus espaços de trabalho da Microsoft, ajudando você a:
 * Criar hubs de espaço de trabalho com base em diferentes critérios, como finalidade ou tópico
 * Classificar equipes, grupos, sites do SharePoint e comunidades do Yammer com tags personalizadas
 * Gerenciar a associação de equipes e grupos
 * Acessar facilmente conteúdo, tarefas e muito mais, associados a cada espaço de trabalho
 * Receber notificações do bot depois de criar novos espaços de trabalho  
 Os clientes da plataforma de confiança da AvePoint também podem realizar tarefas de provisionamento, recertificação e ciclo de vida diretamente do MyHub for AOS-UG no Teams.    
 Novo no MyHub for AOS-UG? [Inscreva-se gratuitamente](https://myhub.avepointonlinegcc.online15.net)  
 Recursos adicionais  
 [Guia do usuário do produto](https://avepointcdn.azureedge.net/assets/webhelp/myhub-administrator-guide/index.htm#!Documents/aboutmyhub.htm)  
 Entre em contato com o [Suporte da AvePoint](https://www.avepoint.com/products/support)  para obter ajuda adicional.
localizedDefinitions.shortDescription: Gerencie e organize facilmente o Microsoft Teams, Grupos, SharePoint e o Yammer

localizedDefinitions.name: MyHub for AOS-UG

localizedDefinitions.longDescription:
MyHub for AOS-UG是一个方便的一站式商店，用于管理现有的Microsoft 365工作区和创建新的工作区-所有这些都来自Microsoft Teams!  
 MyHub for AOS-UG使您轻松地组织、理解和访问所有Microsoft工作区：
 * 根据不同标准创建工作区中心，如创建目的或主题
 * 使用自定义标签对团队、组、SharePoint网站和Yammer社区进行分类
 * 管理团队和组成员
 * 轻松访问每个工作区相关的内容和任务
 * 在创建新工作区后接受来自bot的通知  
 AvePoint’s Confidence Platform的客户还可以在Teams的MyHub for AOS-UG中执行配置，重新认证、以及生命周期相关任务。  
 刚来到MyHub for AOS-UG? [免费注册](https://myhub.avepointonlinegcc.online15.net)  
 其他资源  
 [产品使用指南](https://avepointcdn.azureedge.net/assets/webhelp/myhub-administrator-guide/index.htm#!Documents/aboutmyhub.htm)  
 请联系 [AvePoint 支持](https://www.avepoint.com/products/support) 获取更多帮助。
localizedDefinitions.shortDescription: 便捷管理和组织Microsoft Teams、Groups、SharePoin和Yammer
